name: Mulancia Model 2D Paper puppet
description:
Mulancia is a  character from our "How Noobs Get By"  series.

This is the same model we used in a hand full of Episodes.

Product includes Character Riggs and combination of Eyes and Mouth, and two pairs of shoes.

Disclaimer we didn't make the hands for this model yet.  But they will be included in a future Update. Stay tuned, we appreciate your patience and support. 

This model was made using Traditional Color Pencils.
